CmdLine: apk update && apk upgrade && apk add git autoconf build-base linux-headers nasm bash upx cmake && cd /root/ && git clone https://github.com/mirror/tinycc.git --depth 1 && cd tinycc/ && ./configure --config-musl --prefix=/gcctcc && make && make install && export PATH=/gcctcc/bin:$PATH && make clean && ./configure --config-musl --cc=tcc && make cross && make && make install && rm -rf /var/cache/apk/* && rm -rf /root/tinycc* && rm -rf /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
